UpcomingMovies.Name: Spider-Man: No Way Home
UpcomingMovies.Plot: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, our friendly neighborhood web-slinger is unmasked and no longer able to separate his normal life as Peter Parker from the high stakes of being a superhero. When Peter asks for help from Doctor Strange, the stakes become even more dangerous, forcing him to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

UpcomingMovies.Name: Matrix : Resurrections
UpcomingMovies.Plot: Plagued by strange memories, Neo's life takes an unexpected turn when he finds himself back inside the Matrix.

UpcomingMovies.Name: The King's Man
UpcomingMovies.Plot: One man must race against time to stop history's worst tyrants and criminal masterminds as they get together to plot a war that could wipe out millions of people and destroy humanity.
